explanation: All tokens except the Sun are artificial, man-made devices designed to produce light. The Sun is a natural celestial light source.
Medusa, Minotaur, Cerberus, and Sphinx are all well-known creatures or figures from Greek mythology. Anubis is an ancient Egyptian deity associated with mummification and the afterlife.

Meter (length), Liter (volume), Gram (mass), and Second (time) are all standard units of measurement for fundamental quantities. Volume, however, is a physical quantity itself, not a unit of measurement.
